about_the_game: The Midair Manaborn Game Pass unlocks all of the gameplay unlockables in Midair such as armor types, weapons, packs & augments, and items, FOREVER. If we add new gameplay content, you'll get it immediately. Pay once to unlock all current and future gameplay content.
detailed_description: The Midair Manaborn Game Pass unlocks all of the gameplay unlockables in Midair such as armor types, weapons, packs & augments, and items, FOREVER. If we add new gameplay content, you'll get it immediately. Pay once to unlock all current and future gameplay content.

name: Midair - Manaborn Game Pass
short_description: The Midair Manaborn Game Pass unlocks all of the gameplay unlockables in Midair such as armor types, weapons, packs & augments, and items, FOREVER. If we add new gameplay content, you'll get it immediately. Pay once to unlock all current and future gameplay content forever.
